landing.heroSubtitle: Connecting villages to quality healthcare through telemedicine. Consult doctors, check symptoms, and access your medical records - all from this site.
landing.featuresSubtitle: From symptom checking to prescription delivery, we've built everything you need for comprehensive rural healthcare access.
landing.feature1Desc: Connect with certified doctors through secure video calls from anywhere in rural Punjab.
landing.feature2Desc: Get preliminary health assessments and recommendations using our intelligent symptom analysis.
landing.feature3Desc: Store and access your medical history offline. Share with doctors instantly via QR codes.
landing.feature4Desc: Find nearby pharmacies, check medicine availability, and get delivery updates in real-time.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of patients and doctors already using Nabha Care to deliver quality healthcare across Punjab's villages.
